attributes.action: Lifetime ban, to anyone convicted of animal cruelty from owning pets.
attributes.additional_details: There are several cases in the UK of animal cruelty, but a 10 year ban or less - just isn't good enough. We shouldn't be giving second chances to anyone convicted of animal cruelty.
attributes.background:
Animal abuse is a very sickening crime. Yet, those convicted escape with a 10 year ban and a few months inside prison.

Let's go further - anyone convicted of animal cruelty, to be issued with a lifetime ban owning any pets.

Let's show we really are a nation, of animal lovers.
